item.title: Hamachi
item.dc:creator: @O_M_G1 O M G
item.description:
@O_M_G1 wrote:

Hi, welcome to Mopar

A Hamachi server is pretty easy to make.

Download Hamachi - http://hamachi.cc/download/list.php

Set it up and open it.

On the bottom right there are two buttons, click the second one to the right.

Click Create Network

Chose a network name. Much easier if it’s your server name

Make a password for it, and common one is 123

Open your source, and follow Mod Taharok’s “The ‘perfect’ Compiler! version 1.7” Guide ->http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,49747.0.html

Click on the file you just edited.

Type r and hit enter

In Hamachi at the top is your IP

In the “Runserver.bat” that you opened earlier it says something along the lines of starting [server source] on port [number]. When advertising make sure you have the right port. To change your port in Mopar, click file in the top right and click Change Port, there input your port.

For the IP you just have to put localhost

That should be it. When people play your server they’ll connect to the Hamachi IP, and set their ports, and thats it.

Make sure you follow Mod Taharok’s Ultimate Server Guide

Post back if you have any questions

P.S. A big mistake alot of people have is not changing your elemental variables, make sure you do.

Read full topic
